scripts.messages:extract: mv messages/fr.po messages/fr.old.po; cd artifacts/phase_1/en && gettext-extract --output ../../../messages/fr.new.po --startDelimiter '[#' --endDelimiter '#]' *.pug using/*.pug
scripts.messages:combine: msgcat messages/fr.old.po messages/fr.new.po -o messages/fr.po && rm messages/fr.new.po messages/fr.old.po
scripts.pug:build: cd artifacts/phase_1 && cd fr && cp .layout.pug using/.layout.pug && pug . -o ../../phase_2/fr && cd ../en && cp .layout.pug using/.layout.pug && pug . -o ../../phase_2/en
scripts.html:translate: cd translator && poetry run python translate.py && cd ..
scripts.assets:build: echo 'TODO @ assets:build  compress images & others'; cp -r assets/* dist/
scripts.prepare:i18n: pnpm pug:hydrate && pnpm messages:extract && pnpm messages:combine
scripts.make: concurrently 'pnpm messages:build' 'pnpm pug:build' && mkdir -p dist/fr dist/en && concurrently 'pnpm html:translate' 'pnpm stylus:build' 'pnpm ts:build' 'pnpm assets:build'
